scripts.postinstall: npm run build-deps ; (cd cdk && npm install )
scripts.local-start: sudo -b nohup docker-compose -f local/stack.yml up -d  && sudo tail --retry -f nohup.out
scripts.local-init-db: sudo docker run --rm -v $PWD/local:/opt:ro,delegated --network host --name pgloader dimitri/pgloader:latest pgloader /opt/pgloader-local.cmd
